author: etheriachanalt4233
content:
Not sure where to post this. So many channels!

I couldn't find an Infura community, and this seemed like as good a place as any.

I've been playing with both Infura and Alchemy today, and I prefer the Infura pricing model. But for some reason, while I can do both http and websocket with Alchemy, Infura websockets never connect for me.

Anyone have this issue? I've found some posts with my error response from 2018, but nothing relevant recently. I feel I'm missing some simple step.

> Error: connection not open on send()

author: etheriachanalt4233
content: I've tried adding reconnects which doesn't help, and the primary issue appears to be that people get disconnected if they don't ping the socket periodically. But this is an error I get immediately.
